name: Tied to your Mistakes
description:
Tied to your Mistakes is a game where you are joined to a ghost that replays your actions before you died, leading to puzzling situations and interesting possibilities. We made this game in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2021 for the theme ‘Joined Together’

Music by Darren Curtis.

How To Play

Your character has three lives, which you loose by touching fireballs or spikes. After you die, the ghost replays your actions during your next attempt. As the ghost is immune to fireballs and spikes, you likely need to die first to complete a level.

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • R - Restart Level
